Edit at 1969 hours: Still a piece of shit with the worst community in the world and the world worst anti-cheat in gaming history, cant play without playing against a cheater or with fucking boosted monkeys (best case scenario both) this game doesnt bring me joy as it used to because it was fun, the fun is ruined by making it F2P thanks valve! oh and I forgot about the fact that the hitboxes are still fucked and useless :) thanks
